About Me

Hello! I am a computer engineering student at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville.

If you would like to reach out to me, my email is zengle091@gmail.com





What I am doing now

Currently, I am employed by the University of Tennessee as an undergraduate research assistant. My job involves leading the development of an AI Quantom Materials Chatbot.

I am currently building systems that will allow the gpt-based assistant to remember users and access academic databases to boost credibility and usefulness
